text:
e="preserve">Shuhrat Abbosov (sometimes spelled Shukhrat Abbasov in English) (;) (January 16, 1931 – April 25, 2018) was an Uzbek actor, movie director, screenwriter, and movie producer. He was best known for his movie "Mahallada duv-duv gap" (1960) which is considered to be one of the best Uzbek movies of all time. He was also known for writing the screenplay for the highly-popular 1977 adventure movie "Shum bola."
Abbosov died on April 25, 2018, at the age of 87.
